content: Introduction This is bold text, and this is emphasized text.
title: Welcome

content: This picture was taken on a fall day at Lake Constance (Germany) with a Leica CL 35mm @ Ilford Delta 400. Developed with Caffenol Delta STD. The weather couldn’t decide between rain and sunshine, which led to this grainy and unsharpen mood.
title: Lake Constance

content:
In one experiment I used the very common and cheap to get Kodak Gold 200 and pushed it to 800. Camera was a Minolta SRT 303 with 35mm f1:1.8. The result shows a wonderful and mystical grain. The development with Caffenol was as follows:
Caffenol Delta STD at 20Â°C : Water 650ml Coffee 28g Washing soda 15g Ascobic acid 13g Adofix 1+7 Process: Development 16min, 1min agitation, then 10sec every 1 minute Stop: Rinse 3x with water Fix: Adofix 7min Soak: Ilford Metode 5 -> 10 -> 20 agitation Final rinse: 650ml + wetting agent Results
title: Kodak Gold 200 @800 / Caffenol
